Author: Icanmakeyouhappy
Text: I’m like this; not relatively guilt free (mine still hovers). But it is *so* goddamn frustrating losing and gaining the same pounds. I wish I could hardcore restrict too. But that leads to binging so I have exceptions, like apples, dates, raisins, and bananas. They’re all I eat till about 18:00, then I have one dinner. I don’t bp though, so I hope you stay safe :(
